response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and elevate your business operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand it could be worth $1,000,000 to you. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for, along with a comprehensive support package to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. I hope we can come to an agreement that allows us to collaborate on this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
